snippet: The briny flavor of these little hard-shelled mollusks pairs well with the smokiness of Spanish chorizo in a summery dish that comes together with wine, parsley, lemon — and butter.
abstract: The briny flavor of these little hard-shelled mollusks pairs well with the smokiness of Spanish chorizo in a summery dish that comes together with wine, parsley, lemon — and butter.

byline.original: By JEFF SCHWARZ and GREG KESSLER

headline.main: A Chef in the Field | Littleneck Clams
